author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
method: Stir one tablespoon of the brown sugar, the oats and milk together in a mixing bowl to form a thick paste.  Put the rhubarb, orange juice and remaining brown sugar into the bottom of a baking dish and stir together. Dollop the oat mixture over the top and sprinkle over the demerara sugar. Bake the cobbler for 20-25 minutes or until bubbling and golden-brown on top.
ingredients: 4 tbsp light brown sugar,  5 tbsp porridge oats,  3 tbsp milk,  200g/7oz rhubarb, sliced into 1cm/ Â½in pieces ,  3 tbsp orange juice,  1 tsp demerara sugar
